name: Ext_R5_NamingSystem_url
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.NamingSystem.url for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents NamingSystem.url from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/NamingSystem|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Canonical identifier for this naming system, represented as a URI (globally unique)
element.definition: An absolute URI that is used to identify this naming system when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance; also called its canonical identifier. This SHOULD be globally unique and SHOULD be a literal address at which an authoritative instance of this naming system is (or will be) published. This URL can be the target of a canonical reference. It SHALL remain the same when the naming system is stored on different servers.
element.comment: `NamingSystem.url` has no related element in R4B:NamingSystem
